hmm... No offense, but I don't really like the look of the adapter. If possible, could you make the whole rocket just 1.25 meters?

hmm... No offense, but I don't really like the look of the adapter. If possible, could you make the whole rocket just 1.25 meters?

That'll be Rune's job. I don't want to fiddle to much with his rocket...

That'll be Rune's job. I don't want to fiddle to much with his rocket...

Yeah, that'll be a complete re-engineering, and he doesn't know how it's put together. Sorry, I'll do it ASAP, I just haven't found the time to play this weekend! (Which is actually good, because I was doing other awesome stuff).

Hey hey hey, whats going on here? Fish i'm offended you didn't invite me! Haha just kidding, but I would love to participate.

In fact......an idea that stumbled across my brain while reading through the thread....what if we made this...i dont know.....the mission logs of the FIST? like. That would make the plot easier to write. And like if other companies are doing stuff, we would consider it a partnership with FIST with contracts and all that jazz. I dont know, just a random thought.

Back on topic, when you say "the name of the kerbal you want" are you saying we will edit the kerbal CFG and rename it? cause if so, I want Ender Kerman! I would like to be a designer, a pilot, a missions planner...and...maybe, if it isn't considered too biased and unfair...co-director? haha the last one is iffy, so nobody lose their head over it. This was a cool idea Fish!

Hey hey hey, whats going on here? Fish i'm offended you didn't invite me! Haha just kidding, but I would love to participate.

In fact......an idea that stumbled across my brain while reading through the thread....what if we made this...i dont know.....the mission logs of the FIST? like. That would make the plot easier to write. And like if other companies are doing stuff, we would consider it a partnership with FIST with contracts and all that jazz. I dont know, just a random thought.

Back on topic, when you say "the name of the kerbal you want" are you saying we will edit the kerbal CFG and rename it? cause if so, I want Ender Kerman! I would like to be a designer, a pilot, a missions planner...and...maybe, if it isn't considered too biased and unfair...co-director? haha the last one is iffy, so nobody lose their head over it. This was a cool idea Fish!

Welcome to the project! Unfortunately you must fill out the form for a Kerbonaut and mission planner(yeah, really...). I think that making this the mission log for just one company would be biased, but FIST is already listed as a supporting company.

welcome aboard!

- - - Updated - - -

Yeah, that'll be a complete re-engineering, and he doesn't know how it's put together. Sorry, I'll do it ASAP, I just haven't found the time to play this weekend! (Which is actually good, because I was doing other awesome stuff).

Ok, have fun at your awesome stuff!

There, all done, staging and getting rid of the RCS on the upper stage included. Hope you like the skirt (I thought the shape is kind of distinctive of my design, if I change that it would be completely different), and sorry about the wait again:

http://www./download/v9cjd9yutqou6b2/Caelus+-+Integrated.craft

Rune. It also clocks in pretty much the same delta-v even though it doesn't drop fairings.

There, all done, staging and getting rid of the RCS on the upper stage included. Hope you like the skirt (I thought the shape is kind of distinctive of my design, if I change that it would be completely different), and sorry about the wait again:

http://www./download/v9cjd9yutqou6b2/Caelus+-+Integrated.craft

http://i.imgur.com/cFZ6vzD.png

Rune. It also clocks in pretty much the same delta-v even though it doesn't drop fairings.

Thanks Rune, I kinda like that hump in the middle, very Kerbal!

Welcome to the project! Unfortunately you must fill out the form for a Kerbonaut and mission planner(yeah, really...). I think that making this the mission log for just one company would be biased, but FIST is already listed as a supporting company.

welcome aboard!

Really? REALLY???? Nah i'm just kidding. here's the form

Kerbonaut:

Your Kerbal name(what you want your Kerbal to be called): Ender (Why did you take this name on the main page??????)

Your strengths(what do you do well): Build Rockets, Build Planes, Build Stations, Fly Rockets, Fly Planes (really strong) Rendezvous and dock things

Weaknesses(what you don't do well): ability to think of weaknesses. Oh. stocl Cargo carrying SSTOs. Can't do those.

The most ambitious mission you have flown: Any of my interplanetary missions. I've sent probes to jool, landed on Pol and Bop, (crash)landed a probe at dres, landed a probe on gilly, landed a probe on Ike, and sent a probe screaming past Moho at 20KM and got it back to kerbin.

Mission Planner:

Write why you would be a good fit for this job: Well, I'm very creative, especially in writing, and I can think of 20 good missions just on kerbin right now. Time and effort ranging from easy and quick to hard and hours.

Also, can I apply for co-director? Or do you just decide that?

EDIT: CRAP! Forgot to log out of our company profile! This is Ender, if you were wondering. Sorry!

Edited August 25, 2014 by EnderInferno
Ok guys, sorry for the wait, but I need naming ideas! I need one for the whole program as a whole and one for the first manned programm

Company name:I'm not even going to answer that...

Link to your logo:*boop*

The best craft you have to offer:*badoop*

I have an all body lander if that's your forte.

*cough**cough*
Ok guys, so sorry this is taking long time, but I am going camping this weekend so next week I PROMISE we will star first thng
I guess nothing will come of this either...
Thread owner where are you? I don't want this to die before anything has happend...

I think I just cause these things to die.

x_x

x_x

x_x

ok guys, i am here and i am so sorry for this. I will do my best to try to get things ready for flight, but recently homework has gotten the best of me. I he that this weekend i will have spare time to start the fire here

- - - Updated - - -

I am still determined to have this thing live on
the thread is up in the mission logs forum! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95218-MISTAC-Mission-Logs-Community-Project

I would like to apply as a kerbalnaut.

Name: Phoenix Kerman

Strengths: Rendezvous, spacewalks, and general orbit adjustments

Weaknesses: Docking, Base building (landing close to a target.)

Most ambitious mission: A long term science mission to Duna

Thanks, that is all.

Edited October 3, 2014 by cwheels32

#YOLO

I'd like to sign up as a providing company, representing ATMOS Industries.

We'd make a atmospheric survey vehicle for measuring the atmospheric density at various levels, facilitating easier calculation of trajectories for launch vehicles.

Powerplant: Twin engines

Equipment: BaroStat Atmospheric Science Package (pat. ATMOS Ind.)

Crew capacity: None, unkerbaled

Speed: 500kph

Armament: Twin antiaircraft missiles to combat any rebel/splinter antiscience factions

Name: BTL-2 Betelgeuse UASV (Unmanned Armed Scientific Vehicle)
Awesome, thank you Fishinferno for keeping it alive, i'm looking forward to future developments.

sorry but the companies only make crafts as needed right now. do you still want to participate?
rune, i need you to fix the craft please
Sure, I'll still participate.
So as a kerbalnaut will you PM me and send me the craft/save when i need to fly a mission?
I can fix the craft if you want me to...
